title: ROUTT 45 FEATURED BUILD–LTD SHIMANO GRX
content:
During the summer of 2022 Shimano released a Limited Edition GRX groupset. The limited group came in one configuration of mechanical shifting and hydraulic brakes. Shimano left the lever blades, crank arms, derailleurs and brake calipers raw with a polished …

The post ROUTT 45 FEATURED BUILD–LTD SHIMANO GRX appeared first on Moots Cycles.
author: jthompson
